paramInformation.label: Customer Function
paramInformation.description: Customer function switch, using bit control

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: The interval time for auto report the battery level

metadata.inclusion:
1. Have Z-Wave™ Controller entered inclusion mode.
2. Pressing button three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.
3. After add successful, the device will wake to receive the setting command from Z-Wave™ Controller about 20 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
1. Have Z-Wave™ Controller entered exclusion mode.
2. Pressing button three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode. Node ID has been removed
metadata.reset:
Notice: Use this procedure only in the event that the primary controller is lost or otherwise inoperable.
1. Pressing button four times within 1.5 seconds and do not release the button in the 4 th pressed, and the red LED will light ON.
2. After the red LED flash 9 times, release the button within 2 seconds.
3. IDs are removed and all settings will reset to factory default
